thread.title: £5 worth of Beauty Club points
thread.title_full: £5 worth of Beauty Club points - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: £5 worth of Beauty Club points
text: Telegraph readers can claim £5 worth of points to spend on make-up, fragrance and skincare at Debenhams when you purchase anything in Beauty and Fragrance and register for the Beauty Club Reward Card. The points are valid across an array of top beauty and fragrance brands such as Lancôme, Dior and Urban Decay and can be redeemed both in store and online. How to claim See the newspaper this Saturday, August 1 for details on how to claim. telegraph.co.uk Follow @telegraph
